title: Google\Cloud\Functions\V1\FailurePolicy
name: FailurePolicy
description:
Describes the policy in case of function's execution failure.

If empty, then defaults to ignoring failures (i.e. not retrying them).

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.functions.v1.FailurePolicy

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.retry
params.description: If specified, then the function will be retried in case of a failure.
